card.name: Exalted Seed
card.text:
{Shroud} {Summon} Place counters on this card equal to the amount of materials attached to it. {Upkeep} Remove 1 counter from this card: double its strength and toughness.
It begins in deep space warped by dark power.

card.name: Master of Lords
card.text:
{Summon} Target a Quanta Lord; while this card is on the field, it has one ability of your choice, and that Quanta Lord is purged.
A middling creature, easily dispatched by its superiors, and yet...

card.name: Kalamesian Pujari
card.text:
{Flash} Exert: Purge a unit, then you can restore its original effects.
The humble priest, a scholar of virtuous healing and brutal sacrifice.

card.name: Tiny Sickle
card.text:
If you summon this card by evolving, it gains [Toxic] and [Swift]. {Evolve} Gain +2/+1
There is no lasting hierarchy among the Verol; there is only the moment's duty. Even the lowest of the low won't hesitate.

card.name: Seventh Son
card.text:
{Summon} Attach two cards from your graveyard as material. If this card is material, you can detach it and add it to your deck.
The flow of many bloodlines converged in one locus...t.

card.name: Offshoot
card.text:
Create a token copy of a friendly material.
The species will likely cease to exist within the decade. It preserveres nonetheless.

card.name: Zao, the Weaver
card.text:
Has [Shroud] while you have other friendly units. Your units gain the effect... "{Summon} Give another friendly unit +2/0 or 0/+2."
He became the guiding hand of Kalamesh's third colony. It has long since declared independance.

card.name: Oozing Captain
card.text:
{Summon} Remove an ability from all enemy units that have one; for each removed ability, give a friendly unit [Toxic].
Sailed to the Searing Seas to find new life for himself. Found new life in himself.

card.name: Tongue-Twister
card.text:
{Flash} Exert: Give an opponent control of this card until the end of their turn; when you regain control of it, the opponent that had it reveals a card from their hand.
"Let me tell you about the time I killed a Zulra bare-handed..."

card.name: Omen of Omens
card.text:
Scry 10, then activate a {Summon} effect from one of those cards (if applicable), then shuffle your deck.
The Prophets' guild keeps inserting prophets into their prophecies...
